argument.name: Short_Time_Equivalent
argument.description: A character string representation of a short time value that can be sorted. The format is hhmmssP

argument.name: shorttime
argument.description: A short time value. For example: 09:27:16 91 am

page.description: Converts a time value into a string. Format is 0h0m0s3.
page.discussion: The CShortTime() function converts a short time value into a character value that can be used in a sort expression.
page.example: dim st as Y st = now() ? st = 09:38:35 80 am ? cshorttime(st) = "093835803"
